languages.text: {n}Идира опасливо прищуривается, словно не до конца веря в вашу искренность. Наконец, выражение ее лица смягчается.{/n} "Спасибо, Лорд-капитан. Пожалуй, именно благодаря вам я все еще жива — многие на вашем месте давно бы уже прикончили буйную ведьму. Впрочем, мы оба с вами знаем, что мне не долго осталось". {n}Псайкер мрачно ухмыляется.{/n} "Но что мы все о грустном? Давайте уж лучше о ждущей нас самоубийственной авантюре!"

{n}Idira narrows her eyes warily, as if not fully convinced of your sincerity. Then her expression softens.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain. I guess you're the only reason I'm still alive — most people in your shoes would've killed the wild witch long ago. Though, well, we both know I don't have long." {n}She smiles darkly.{/n} "Well, no point in talking about the depressing stuff! Let's talk about our suicidal expedition instead!"

Though, well, we both know I don't have long." {n}She smiles darkly.{/n} "Well, no point in talking about the depressing stuff! Let's talk about our suicidal expedition instead!"

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉小心翼翼地眯起眼睛，似乎并没有完全相信你的诚意。随后，她的表情变得柔和下来。{/n}“谢谢你，舰长大人。我猜我之所以还能活着，完全是因为有你在。换做别人，恐怕他们早就把我这个违法的女巫杀死了。不过，你我都清楚，我的时间已经所剩无几了。”{n}她露出了阴沉的微笑。{/n}“好了，没必要再谈论这些令人沮丧的事情了！还是谈谈咱们这场自杀式的冒险吧！”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira narrows her eyes warily, as if not fully convinced of your sincerity. Then her expression softens.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain. I guess you're the only reason I'm still alive — most people in your shoes would've killed the wild witch long ago. Though, well, we both know I don't have long." {n}She smiles darkly.{/n} "Well, no point in talking about the depressing stuff! Let's talk about our suicidal expedition instead!"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉小心翼翼地眯起眼睛，似乎并没有完全相信你的诚意。随后，她的表情变得柔和下来。{/n}“谢谢你，舰长大人。我猜我之所以还能活着，完全是因为有你在。换做别人，恐怕他们早就把我这个违法的女巫杀死了。不过，你我都清楚，我的时间已经所剩无几了。”{n}她露出了阴沉的微笑。{/n}“好了，没必要再谈论这些令人沮丧的事情了！还是谈谈咱们这场自杀式的冒险吧！”

languages.text: {n}Idira blickt dich misstrauisch an, als wäre sie nicht gänzlich überzeugt von deiner Aufrichtigkeit. Dann löst sich ihre Miene.{/n} "Danke, Lord Captain. Ihr seid wohl der einzige Grund, warum ich noch lebe. Die meisten Leute hätten die wilde Hexe an Eurer Stelle schon längst getötet. Aber, nun ja, wir wissen ja beide, dass ich nicht mehr lange habe." {n}Sie lächelt düster.{/n} "Nun, lasst uns nicht über deprimierende Dinge reden! Reden wir lieber über unsere selbstmörderische Expedition!"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira narrows her eyes warily, as if not fully convinced of your sincerity. Then her expression softens.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain. I guess you're the only reason I'm still alive — most people in your shoes would've killed the wild witch long ago. Though, well, we both know I don't have long." {n}She smiles darkly.{/n} "Well, no point in talking about the depressing stuff! Let's talk about our suicidal expedition instead!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira blickt dich misstrauisch an, als wäre sie nicht gänzlich überzeugt von deiner Aufrichtigkeit. Dann löst sich ihre Miene.{/n} "Danke, Lord Captain. Ihr seid wohl der einzige Grund, warum ich noch lebe. Die meisten Leute hätten die wilde Hexe an Eurer Stelle schon längst getötet. Aber, nun ja, wir wissen ja beide, dass ich nicht mehr lange habe." {n}Sie lächelt düster.{/n} "Nun, lasst uns nicht über deprimierende Dinge reden! Reden wir lieber über unsere selbstmörderische Expedition!"

languages.text: {n}Idira plisse les yeux avec circonspection comme si elle doutait de votre sincérité avant de se radoucir.{/n} « Merci, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. J'imagine que c'est grâce à vous si je suis toujours en vie. J'en connais beaucoup qui auraient tué la sorcière dès le premier jour, à votre place. Enfin, on sait {mf|tous|toutes} les deux qu'il ne me reste plus beaucoup de temps, {n}ajoute-t-elle avec un sourire sombre.{/n} Bah, ça ne sert à rien de broyer du noir ! Tenez, et si on parlait plutôt de notre expédition suicide ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira narrows her eyes warily, as if not fully convinced of your sincerity. Then her expression softens.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain. I guess you're the only reason I'm still alive — most people in your shoes would've killed the wild witch long ago. Though, well, we both know I don't have long." {n}She smiles darkly.{/n} "Well, no point in talking about the depressing stuff! Let's talk about our suicidal expedition instead!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira plisse les yeux avec circonspection comme si elle doutait de votre sincérité avant de se radoucir.{/n} « Merci, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. J'imagine que c'est grâce à vous si je suis toujours en vie. J'en connais beaucoup qui auraient tué la sorcière dès le premier jour, à votre place. Enfin, on sait {mf|tous|toutes} les deux qu'il ne me reste plus beaucoup de temps, {n}ajoute-t-elle avec un sourire sombre.{/n} Bah, ça ne sert à rien de broyer du noir ! Tenez, et si on parlait plutôt de notre expédition suicide ? »

languages.text: {n}Idira entrecierra los ojos, como si dudara de tu sinceridad. Después, su expresión se suaviza.{/n} «Gracias, Lord Capitán. Supongo que es gracias a usted que aún vivo. La mayoría de la gente en su lugar hubiera matado a esta bruja descontrolada. Aunque, bueno, l{mf|o|a}s dos sabemos que no me queda mucho». {n}Sonríe tristemente.{/n} «Pero bueno, ya está bien de conversaciones deprimentes, ¡vamos a hablar de nuestra inminente misión suicida!».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira narrows her eyes warily, as if not fully convinced of your sincerity. Then her expression softens.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain. I guess you're the only reason I'm still alive — most people in your shoes would've killed the wild witch long ago. Though, well, we both know I don't have long." {n}She smiles darkly.{/n} "Well, no point in talking about the depressing stuff! Let's talk about our suicidal expedition instead!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira entrecierra los ojos, como si dudara de tu sinceridad. Después, su expresión se suaviza.{/n} «Gracias, Lord Capitán. Supongo que es gracias a usted que aún vivo. La mayoría de la gente en su lugar hubiera matado a esta bruja descontrolada. Aunque, bueno, l{mf|o|a}s dos sabemos que no me queda mucho». {n}Sonríe tristemente.{/n} «Pero bueno, ya está bien de conversaciones deprimentes, ¡vamos a hablar de nuestra inminente misión suicida!».

languages.text: {n}イディラはあなたの誠意に完全には納得していないかのように、用心深く目を細めた。それから表情を和らげる。{/n}「ありがとう、ロード・キャプテン。どうやらあたいが今生きているのはあなたのおかげみたいね…あなたと同じ立場にある人間なら、大抵はとうの昔に野良の魔女なんか殺してるはずだもの」{n}彼女は暗い微笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「まあ、憂鬱な話をしても仕方がないわね！もうやめて、あたいたちの自殺遠征について話しましょう！」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira narrows her eyes warily, as if not fully convinced of your sincerity. Then her expression softens.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain. I guess you're the only reason I'm still alive — most people in your shoes would've killed the wild witch long ago. Though, well, we both know I don't have long." {n}She smiles darkly.{/n} "Well, no point in talking about the depressing stuff! Let's talk about our suicidal expedition instead!"

languages.text: {n}İdira, temkinli bir şekilde gözlerini kısıyor. Sözlerinin samimiyetine tam olarak ikna olmamış gibi duruyor. Sonrasında yüz ifadesi yumuşuyor.{/n} "Teşekkürler Lord Kaptan. Sanıyorum hayatta kalmış olmamı tamamen sana borçluyum. Çoğu insan senin yerinde olsa bu vahşi cadıyı çoktan öldürmüştü. Hoş, ikimiz de çok zamanım kalmadığını biliyoruz." {n}Kasvetli bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Neyse, can sıkıcı şeylerden konuşmanın bir anlamı yok! Onun yerine önümüzdeki intihar görevinden konuşalım!"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira narrows her eyes warily, as if not fully convinced of your sincerity. Then her expression softens.{/n} "Thank you, Lord Captain. I guess you're the only reason I'm still alive — most people in your shoes would've killed the wild witch long ago. Though, well, we both know I don't have long." {n}She smiles darkly.{/n} "Well, no point in talking about the depressing stuff! Let's talk about our suicidal expedition instead!"
